A cool hack for rand

October 5, 2015

This trick is useful when one’s need a 50% of chance of something in PHP.

$yesOrNo = rand()&1;

This is equivalent to:

$yesOrNo = rand(0, 1);

But fast. It’s faster quicker than the conventional because it avoids method parsing.

So next time you need it, remember this cool trick.
